recipe.title: Truffled Mashed Potatoes
ingredients: 2 pounds russet potatoes, peeled, sliced 1/4 inch thick
1/3 cup crème fraîche or sour cream
instructions: Cook potatoes in large pot of boiling salted water until tender, about 13 minutes. Drain. Return to pot. Mash. Stir in remaining ingredients. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
